erros.desconhecido: Unidentified error. Contact the Department of Informatics.

forms.criteriosPass:
• Length: 9 (minimum) to 16 (maximum) characters.
  • Allowed characters:
    • (a ... z) (A ... Z) (0 ... 9) ! @ # $ & | . = + _ -
  • Complexity: at least one lowercase, one uppercase, one digit, and one special character.
  • Renewal period: 180 days (it is not allowed to repeat any of the last 4).
forms.erasmusRegistrationInfo:
All personal data collected will be registered, used and protected by Instituto Politécnico de Viana do Castelo (IPVC), in accordance with the terms defined in the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and in the regulations of Erasmus mobility programs and similar European Programs. Your personal data identified with (*) in this form, is necessary to complete your registration and will be used by IPVC to provide information to your institution of origin, for contacts, for following and monitoring the registration process under the Mobility Program.
At any time, if you wish to review the option selected above, you can contact IPVC International Office using the email international@ipvc.pt.

manutencao.title: We'll be back soon!
manutencao.subtitle: System in maintenance
manutencao.p1: The system is in maintenance mode and is not available at this time. Thank you for your understanding. If necessary you can contact us:
manutencao.p2: The normality of the service will be restored soon.

browserincompativel.title: Incompatible browser
browserincompativel.p1:
The system does not support the browser version.
If necessary, you can contact us:
browserincompativel.p2: Supported browsers: Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Opera and Safari
